entry.title: WIND WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SW 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 7:03 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:03 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
